section.title: Using a Viewer to Print &DVI;/&PDF; Files
section.para: &TeX; output files (*.dvi/*.pdf) can be printed from within the viewer.

section.title: Using &mtprint; to Print &DVI; Files
section.para: &DVI; files can also be printed with the help of the command-line utility &mtprint; (&MiKTeXPrintUtility;).
